title: The Bitti Chai
description: A tale of ghosts, jealousy, prejudice and passion set in the wilds of Dartmoor, England. 15 year-old Reigneth Gray is the prophet the world has waited for. Her Romany family guard her secret and protect her from the outside world, but when Reigneth is drawn to the young and gifted musician, Johnny Wilmott, love threatens to blow their worlds apart.
author: Jane  Gray
